entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few flurries beginning near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
